conversion_verification.notes: The render provides 3D geometry (wall thickness and height) but utilizes a top-down orthographic/parallel projection rather than an angled isometric perspective.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have thickness and volume is clearly perceivable. However, the lack of an angled camera view (nearly pure top-down) limits the visibility of vertical surfaces.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Extremely high fidelity. All rooms, wall segments, and door swings align perfectly with the source blueprint.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is nearly 1:1 including kitchen islands, bathroom fixtures, and bedroom layouts.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering, soft shadows help differentiate height. No text contamination.

detected_errors.description: Camera perspective is orthographic top-down rather than the requested angled isometric view.

summary: An exceptionally accurate geometric reconstruction that follows the layout perfectly, though it uses a flat top-down camera projection instead of an isometric one.
